headline.main: SHIPPING--MAILS; ALL HOURS GIVEN IN DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, June 30--The list of countries supporting United Nations action in Korea grew tonight to thirty-three and the official cablegram office here decided to stay on the job on a twentyfour hour basis to handle the communiques from capitals...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, June 30--The list of countries supporting United Nations action in Korea grew tonight to thirty-three and the official cablegram office here decided to stay on the job on a twentyfour hour basis to handle the communiques from capitals all over the world.

headline.main: 33 COUNTRIES BACK SECURITY COUNCIL; List of Nations Approving U.N. Action on Korea Still Rising --Military Aid Pledged

byline.original: By A.M. ROSENTHAL Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: National security from the standpoint of the merchant marine will be submitted to an intensive re-examination and appraisal this week.
docs.lead_paragraph: National security from the standpoint of the merchant marine will be submitted to an intensive re-examination and appraisal this week.

headline.main: SHIP MEN PROD U.S. ON MARITIME NEEDS; Leaders to Urge Immediate Action on Deficiencies They Regard as Critical

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, July 2 (Reuters)--Four countries--Brazil, Spain, Sweden and Uruguay--today won berths in next week's play-offs for the world soccer championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, July 2 (Reuters)--Four countries--Brazil, Spain, Sweden and Uruguay--today won berths in next week's play-offs for the world soccer championship.
docs.abstract: US eliminated by Chile; GB by Spain; other matches
